slotVal = {value = slotTbl[1],txt=slotTxt[1]}
player = false
function onLoad(save_state)
if save_state ~= "" then
saved_data = JSON.decode(save_state)
    if saved_data.spdVal then
    for spd,_ in pairs(spdVal) do
    spdVal[spd] = saved_data.spdVal[spd]
    end
    end
    if saved_data.atkVal then
    for res,_ in pairs(atkVal) do
    atkVal[res] = saved_data.atkVal[res]
    end
    end
    if saved_data.defVal then
    for res,_ in pairs(defVal) do
    defVal[res] = saved_data.defVal[res]
    end
    end
if saved_data.dmgVal then
    for res,_ in pairs(dmgVal) do
    dmgVal[res] = saved_data.dmgVal[res]
    end
    end
if saved_data.slotVal then
    for res,_ in pairs(slotVal) do
    slotVal[res] = saved_data.slotVal[res]
    end
    end
if saved_data.index then
    index = saved_data.index
    end
    if saved_data.statNames then
    for stat,_ in pairs(statNames) do
    statNames[stat] = saved_data.statNames[stat]
    end
    end
  end
  local script = self.getLuaScript()
  local xml = script:sub(script:find("StartXML")+8, script:find("StopXML")-1)
  self.UI.setXml(xml)
  Wait.frames(load, 10)
end
function load()
  self.UI.setAttribute("panel", "position", "0 10 -" .. self.getBounds().size.y / self.getScale().y * 160)
  self.UI.setAttribute("spdText", "text", spdVal.value)
  self.UI.setAttribute("spdText", "color", spdVal.txt)
  self.UI.setAttribute("speed", "fillImage", spdVal.color)
  self.UI.setAttribute("atkText", "text", atkVal.value)
  self.UI.setAttribute("atkText", "color", atkVal.txt)
  self.UI.setAttribute("attack", "fillImage", atkVal.color)
  self.UI.setAttribute("defText", "text", defVal.value)
  self.UI.setAttribute("defText", "color", defVal.txt)
  self.UI.setAttribute("defense", "fillImage", defVal.color)
  self.UI.setAttribute("dmgText", "text", dmgVal.value)
  self.UI.setAttribute("dmgText", "color", dmgVal.txt)
  self.UI.setAttribute("damage", "fillImage", dmgVal.color)
  self.UI.setAttribute("slotText", "text", slotVal.value)
  self.UI.setAttribute("slotText", "color", slotVal.txt)
  for i,j in pairs(statNames) do
    if j == true then
    self.UI.setAttribute(i, "active", true)
    end
  end
  Wait.frames(function() self.UI.setAttribute("statePanel", "width", getStatsCount()*300) end, 1)
  createBtns()
end
function onSave()
  local save_state = JSON.encode({index=index,spdVal=spdVal,atkVal=atkVal,defVal=defVal,dmgVal=dmgVal,slotVal=slotVal,statNames=statNames})
  self.script_state = save_state
end
function createBtns()
  local btnParam={click_function="add",function_owner=self,position={-0.3,0.04,-0.4},label="<",width=225,height=225, font_size = 300,color={0,0,0,1},font_color={1,1,1,100}}
  self.createButton(btnParam)
  btnParam.position={0.3, 0.04,-0.4}
  btnParam.click_function="sub"
  btnParam.label=">"
  self.createButton(btnParam)
end
function add() onClick(-1, - 1, "add") end
function sub() onClick(-1, - 1, "sub")end
function onClick(player, value,id)
  if id=="add" and index<#spdCol then 
spdVal.value=spdTbl[index+1]
spdVal.color=spdCol[index+1]
spdVal.txt=spdTxt[index+1]
atkVal.value=atkTbl[index+1]
atkVal.color=atkCol[index+1]
atkVal.txt=atkTxt[index+1]
defVal.value=defTbl[index+1]
defVal.color=defCol[index+1]
defVal.txt=defTxt[index+1]
dmgVal.value=dmgTbl[index+1]
dmgVal.color=dmgCol[index+1]
dmgVal.txt=dmgTxt[index+1]
slotVal.value=slotTbl[index+1]
slotVal.txt=slotTxt[index+1]
index=index+1
    elseif id=="sub" and index>1 then 
spdVal.value=spdTbl[index-1]
spdVal.color=spdCol[index-1]
spdVal.txt=spdTxt[index-1]
atkVal.value=atkTbl[index-1]
atkVal.color=atkCol[index-1]
atkVal.txt=atkTxt[index-1]
defVal.value=defTbl[index-1]
defVal.color=defCol[index-1]
defVal.txt=defTxt[index-1]
dmgVal.value=dmgTbl[index-1]
dmgVal.color=dmgCol[index-1]
dmgVal.txt=dmgTxt[index-1]
slotVal.value=slotTbl[index-1]
slotVal.txt=slotTxt[index-1]
index=index-1
elseif statNames[id] ~= nil then
    self.UI.setAttribute(id, "active", false)
    self.UI.setAttribute("statePanel", "width", tonumber(self.UI.getAttribute("statePanel", "width")-300))
    statNames[id] = false
    elseif id == "spdU" then spdVal.value=spdVal.value+1
elseif id == "spdD" then spdVal.value=spdVal.value-1
elseif id == "atkU" then atkVal.value=atkVal.value+1
elseif id == "atkD" then atkVal.value=atkVal.value-1
elseif id == "defU" then defVal.value=defVal.value+1
elseif id == "defD" then defVal.value=defVal.value-1
elseif id == "dmgU" then dmgVal.value=dmgVal.value+1
elseif id == "dmgD" then dmgVal.value=dmgVal.value-1
end
self.UI.setAttribute("spdText", "text", spdVal.value)
self.UI.setAttribute("spdText", "color", spdVal.txt)
self.UI.setAttribute("speed", "fillImage", spdVal.color)
self.UI.setAttribute("atkText", "text", atkVal.value)
self.UI.setAttribute("atkText", "color", atkVal.txt)
self.UI.setAttribute("attack", "fillImage", atkVal.color)
self.UI.setAttribute("defText", "color", defVal.txt)
    self.UI.setAttribute("defText", "text", defVal.value)
self.UI.setAttribute("defense", "fillImage", defVal.color)
self.UI.setAttribute("dmgText", "text", dmgVal.value)
self.UI.setAttribute("dmgText", "color", dmgVal.txt)
self.UI.setAttribute("damage", "fillImage", dmgVal.color)
self.UI.setAttribute("slotText", "text", slotVal.value)
self.UI.setAttribute("slotText", "color", slotVal.txt)
  end
function onCollisionEnter(a)
  local newState = a.collision_object.getName()
  if statNames[newState] ~= nil then
    statNames[newState] = true
    a.collision_object.destruct()
    self.UI.setAttribute(newState, "active", true)
    Wait.frames(function() self.UI.setAttribute("statePanel", "width", getStatsCount()*300) end, 1)
  end
end
function getStatsCount()
  local count = 0
  for i,j in pairs(statNames) do
    if self.UI.getAttribute(i,"active")=="True" or self.UI.getAttribute(i,"active")=="true" then count=count+1 end
  end
  return count
end",
  "GUID": "cpjw001"
}
